title: PERFECT LOCATION, FIRST CLASS AMENITIES!!
posting_body: ['1 Bedrooms starting at $1,260', '2 Bedrooms starting at $1,460', 'Perimeter Fence, 11 Laundry Rooms, Community Parking Garage, Pool, Dog Park, Theater Room, Elevators, Fitness Center, Club House, Door To Door Trash Pickup, Gated Entrance, Bus Stop', 'Premium Countertops, Frost Free Refrigerators, Ceiling Fans, Ice Makers, Dishwashers, Microwaves, Cable Ready, Garbage Disposals, Miniblinds, Non-Carpeted Flooring, Premium Appliances, Hi-Speed Internet', '1 SOURCE APARTMENT LOCATORS', 'Top Rated locator service with 500+ Five star reviews.', 'OUR SERVICE IS FREE!', 'We can help with Second Chance on Select Properties (Broken Leases, Property Debt, Evictions, Bankruptcy, Felonies and Misdemeanors)', 'Free Move or Cash Rebate on all qualifying properties', 'PHONE: 2.1.4.3.9.6.6.7.6.8', 'TEXT: 9.7.2.5.4.4.4.4.5.7', 'Refer To Apt#7384A']
